heading: Gentle as a summer breeze.
subheading: Experience perfect comfort with Naitec Sensitive. Enjoy clean air without drafts, free from allergens and impurities, evenly cooled for maximum comfort.
why_info_item_1_description: Draft-free, diffuse cooling ensures even and gentle distribution of cooled air throughout the room without unpleasant drafts. This system enhances user comfort and eliminates the risk of catching a cold.
why_info_item_2_description: With a noise level of only 18 dB in the quietest mode, we guarantee exceptionally quiet operation, almost imperceptible. This low noise performance ensures a peaceful environment, ideal for bedrooms, offices, and other quiet spaces where calm and comfort are important.
why_info_item_3_description: A UVC lamp eliminates bacteria and viruses, while an ionizer removes dust, allergens, and other impurities. Together, these innovations create a healthier and safer environment in your home.
why_info_item_4_description: Controlling the air conditioner via Wi-Fi allows easy adjustment of temperature, modes, and other functions from your smartphone or tablet, anytime, anywhere.
why_info_item_5_description: The high energy efficiency of R32 coolant ensures more efficient cooling and heating, while reducing environmental impact. It is an ideal choice for a more sustainable future.
all_you_need_item_1_description: This technology automatically cleans the indoor evaporator, enhancing air quality and ensuring a healthier environment.
all_you_need_item_1_long_description: When the 'sterilization' function is activated, the evaporator in the indoor unit first freezes and then heats up to 57 °C, which, in combination with the UVC lamp and ionizer, ensures the purification of the indoor unit and the elimination of harmful bacteria. This technology provides your home with a refreshing atmosphere and a healthy environment without unnecessary negative effects.
all_you_need_item_2_description: The ability to effectively heat down to -15 °C ensures a comfortable and pleasant environment even during colder winter days.
all_you_need_item_3_description: We prioritize quality, which is why we offer a 5-year warranty to ensure long-term reliability.
all_you_need_item_3_long_description: The extended warranty is valid only if regular maintenance is performed at least once a year by the supplier from whom you purchased the air conditioner.
all_you_need_item_4_description: Purchase the Lisa voice controller for simple and convenient control of your air conditioner using voice commands.
all_you_need_item_5_description: In the app, you can set the desired performance limit of the air conditioner, allowing you to save up to 70% of energy.
